title: About Me
content: A polyglot programmer with 5+ years of work experience in multi-tenant SaaS/Cloud application development. Currently pursuing Masters in Computer Science (Big Data Systems) at Arizona State University, Tempe. Actively seeking full-time software developer opportunity starting May 2021.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Currently, I'm seeking a full time software engineering position in bay area (US).

skills.title: skills
